lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt will run the 100 meters June 12 in an Adidas Grand Prix meet in New York City on Randalls Island, where he set his first world record, in the 100, in 2008.
snippet: Usain Bolt will run the 100 meters June 12 in an Adidas Grand Prix meet in New York City on Randalls Island, where he set his first world record, in the 100, in 2008.
